summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for, the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of a Public Alley over and across the East sixteen (16) feet of Tracts Eight (8), Nine (9) and Ten (10), Claremont Home Tracts, as provided in Ordinance No. 46343, of the City of Seattle, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
